projects.title: SDL3-based C++ Audio Visualizer
projects.desc: A DSP project that utilizes concepts of FFT and encodes media through FFMPEG in C/C++ which allows for the synthesis of audio reactive videos.

projects.title: GWeb Dodge
projects.desc: A HaxeFlixel music-based game made in 5 days about dodging falling bricks and shooting evil triangles.

projects.title: FNF Vs Tabi
projects.desc: An indie project with a team of 4 members creating a modification of an existing HaxeFlixel rhythm game named Friday Night Funkin' that adds in a new character and became popular with millions of downloads from its novel visual effects and mechanics.

projects.title: Eternal Time Tracker
projects.desc: A mobile app for listing tasks and keeps track of when they will or had occurred.

projects.title: Riddem
projects.desc: A cross-platform Godot-based rhythm game made in 72 hours with features such as audio reactivity, visual effects, and my music.

projects.title: BadFlixel
projects.desc: A port of the famous Bad Apple video on HaxeFlixel using its builtin rendering features loading a customized binary format which was generated from OpenCV consisting of contour data.

projects.title: Squake
projects.desc: A HaxeFlixel game made in 3 hours (including its soundtrack) from the words: Square and Snake which is based on the appearance of the main player as a snake trying to avoid randomly spawning squares inside the digital grid.

projects.title: MangDownloader
projects.desc: A Godot-based roguelike game made in 26 hours about shooting infinitely spawning enemies such as a hypertriangle that follows and attacks you and a turret that constantly aims and shoots.

projects.title: Jump Cubic
projects.desc: A Godot-based roguelike game made in 26 hours about shooting infinitely spawning enemies such as a hypertriangle that follows and attacks you and a turret that constantly aims and shoots.
